timeline.message: Preliminary preprocessor and preliminary uuid-based preview servlet filter
Adding a preview filter that delivers uuid-based xref targets, and adding a servlet that previews module variants directly
Refactoring a bit of logic and removing println's
fixing variant preview servlet for assemblies
xrefs to anchors now mostly work
xrefs pretty much work for assemblies, there might be a haml bug getting in the way but the link targets are correctly rewritten
Adding empty anchor check necessitated by triangle xrefs

timeline.bodyText: are those allowed values for RELEASED_SUFFICES?
timeline.author: xdavidson

replies.bodyText: Yes, the idea here is that the suffix is optional. If you don't specify it, we assume you want the released version. This covers all the cases: [document, document/, document/released]
